text:
TIRUNELVELI

Alcoholics Anonymous and Al-Anon: Regular meeting, MDT Hindu College Higher Secondary School, Tirunelveli Junction, 7 p.m.

IRUDHAYAKULAM

St. Lourdes Shrine Grotto: Annual feast, eighth day celebrations, Holy Mass by Rev. Fr. M.S. Antonysamy, homily by Rev. Fr. Francis, parish priest, Shankar Nagar, grotto premises, 6 p.m.

VALLIYOOR

Tamil Nadu Generation and Distribution Corporation: Grievance day for consumers of Valliyoor, Office of the Executive Engineer, 11 a.m.

PULIYAMPATTI

St. Antony’s Shrine: Annual feast, ninth day celebrations, Holy Mass, 6 a.m.; rosary, 12 noon; Holy Mass by Rev. Fr. I. Sahaya Chinnappan, parish priest, Tenkasi, homily by Rev. Fr. S.M. Arulraj, parish priest, Kaamanaickenpatti, benediction, church premises, 6.30 p.m.

THOOTHUKUDI

Indian Coast Guard: Coast Guard week celebration, blood donation camp, near Camp –II, Coast Guard Residential Area, 9 a.m.

District administration: Fishermen grievance redressal meeting, Department of Fisheries, Collector M. Ravikumar presides, Muthu Arangam, Collectorate, 11 a.m.

Holy Cross Home Science College, Department of English: National seminar on ‘Ecological consideration in feminist perspectives – “ECOFEMIN 2016”,’ R. Jeyasundar, Head, Department of English, St. John’s College, Tirunelveli, chief guest, presides, college premises, 9.30 a.m.
title: Engagements
